mapper.select: SELECT * FROM room WHERE room_index IN ( SELECT room_index FROM room WHERE room.category_index IN (SELECT category_index FROM category WHERE location LIKE '%${req.location}%' AND kind LIKE '%${req.kind}%') AND room.address_index IN (SELECT room_address_index FROM room_address WHERE si_do LIKE '%${req.siDo}%' AND si_gun_gu LIKE '%${req.siGunGu}%') AND room.room_index IN (SELECT available_date.room_index FROM available_date WHERE date BETWEEN #{req.checkInDate} AND #{req.checkOutDate} GROUP BY room_index HAVING COUNT(room_index) >= ${differenceDay}) AND room.max_person > ${req.maxPerson} ) ORDER BY room.room_index DESC LIMIT ${index},15;
SELECT * FROM room ORDER BY room_index DESC LIMIT ${index},15;
SELECT room_address_index FROM room_address WHERE si_do = #{siDo} AND si_gun_gu = #{siGunGu} AND eup_myeon_dong = #{eupMyeonDong} AND road_name = #{roadName} AND detail_address = #{detailAddress};

SELECT room_index FROM room WHERE address_index = #{addressIndex} AND category_index = #{categoryIndex} AND user_index = #{userIndex} AND name = #{name} AND price = #{price} AND clean_price = #{cleanPrice} AND max_person = #{maxPerson} AND content = #{content} ORDER BY room_index DESC LIMIT 0,1;
SELECT date FROM available_date WHERE room_index = #{roomIndex} ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT room_index roomIndex, self_check_in selfCheckIn, common_solo commonSolo FROM information WHERE room_index = #{roomIndex};

SELECT room_index roomIndex, bed, bath,tv, hair_dryer hairDryer,fire_extinguisher fireExtinguisher, refrigerator, microwave, cookware,park,aircon,kitchen,wifi,washing_machine washingMachine FROM facility WHERE room_index = #{roomIndex};

SELECT room_address_index roomAddressIndex, si_do siDo, si_gun_gu siGunGu, eup_myeon_dong eupMyeonDong, road_name roadName, detail_address detailAddress FROM room_address WHERE room_address_index = #{roomAddressIndex};
SELECT category_index categoryIndex, location, kind FROM category WHERE category_index = #{categoryIndex};
